actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating Big Pine Creek and its tributaries within Warren County, Ind., as potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Big Pine Creek Act - Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, Big Pine Creek and its tributaries within Warren County, Indiana, as potential additions to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating Big Pine Creek and its tributaries within Warren County, Ind., as potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
